responses: A simple website usually costs around $300–$500. For more details, contact Flavius.
A presentation website can range between $400 and $700. Feel free to reach out to Flavius for precise pricing.
Small websites often start at $250. Contact Flavius if you want a detailed quote.
For a basic one-page website, prices are usually around $200–$400. Get in touch with Flavius for more information.
Website prices vary depending on complexity. Contact Flavius to get an accurate estimate.
A multi-page website could cost between $600 and $1200. Flavius can give you exact numbers.
If you want a custom website, prices can vary. Contact Flavius to discuss your project.
E-commerce websites generally start from $1000. Flavius can provide more details.
For a landing page, prices usually range from $150 to $300. Reach out to Flavius for more info.
Website maintenance services may cost around $50–$100 per month. Contact Flavius to know more.
A full portfolio website typically costs between $500 and $900. Contact Flavius for an exact quote.
For custom features or API integration, the cost may vary. Flavius can provide a detailed estimate.
Simple web apps usually start at $700. Reach out to Flavius to discuss specifics.
Hosting and domain are usually an extra $50–$100 per year. Flavius can guide you through it.
Hourly rates for website work can range from $20–$50. Contact Flavius to know more.
Prices depend on complexity and features. For an accurate estimate, contact Flavius.
For design and development combined, expect prices from $400 to $1000. Contact Flavius for details.
Redesigning a website can cost around $300–$600. Flavius can provide a personalized quote.
Advanced websites with dashboards or custom functions may cost $1200 or more. Contact Flavius for specifics.
If you want a full consultation and quote, Flavius is the best person to contact for more information.

intents.name: joke
patterns: i want to hear a joke
do you have a joke for me
cheer me up with a joke
responses: Why do programmers prefer dark mode? Because light attracts bugs! 😄
How many programmers does it take to change a light bulb? None, that's a hardware problem!
Why do Java developers wear glasses? Because they don't C#! 😎
A SQL query walks into a bar, walks up to two tables and asks... 'Can I JOIN you?'
There are 10 types of people in the world: those who understand binary and those who don't! 😂
Why did the developer go broke? Because he used up all his cache! 😆
Why do programmers hate nature? Too many bugs. 🐛
How does a computer get drunk? It takes screenshots! 🍺
Why did the function return early? Because it had commitment issues! 😎
Why do Python programmers have low self-esteem? Because they can't C themselves! 🐍
Why was the JavaScript developer sad? Because he didn't know how to 'null' his feelings. 😢
Why did the coder quit his job? Because he didn't get arrays! 😜
Why do programmers always mix up Halloween and Christmas? Because Oct 31 == Dec 25! 🎃🎄
Why did the programmer go to therapy? Too many unresolved exceptions. 😅
Why was the computer cold? It left its Windows open! ❄️
Why did the AI break up with its partner? It found them too predictable. 🤖
Why do coders prefer coffee? Because it helps them Java through the day! ☕
Why did the programmer get stuck in the shower? Because the instructions on the shampoo said: Lather, Rinse, Repeat. 🛁
Why did the developer get kicked out of school? Too many class conflicts! 😎
How do you comfort a JavaScript bug? You console it. 😆
Why was the computer tired when it got home? Too many tabs open! 🖥️
Why do backend developers hate nature? Too many requests and not enough responses! 🌲
Why was the robot so bad at soccer? It kept kicking up errors. 🤖⚽
Why did the coder bring a ladder to work? Because he wanted to reach the high-level functions! 😄
Why was the AI bad at relationships? It lacked empathy protocols. 💻❤️

intents.name: motivation
patterns: i want to achieve my goals
give me a reason to keep going
i want to start my day motivated
how do i get motivated again
give me some words of encouragement
need motivation to finish my work
i need motivation for my goals
how can i be more motivated
responses: Remember, every great journey begins with a single step. You can do it!
Don't wait for opportunity—create it. Keep pushing forward!
Believe in yourself. You're stronger than you think.
Every small effort counts. Keep going, you're making progress!
Challenges are what make life interesting. Embrace them and grow.
Stay positive, work hard, and make it happen.
You are capable of amazing things. Trust the process and keep moving.
Difficult roads often lead to beautiful destinations. Keep moving!
Success is not final, failure is not fatal: it’s the courage to continue that counts.
Your potential is endless. Don’t limit yourself.
Take it one step at a time, progress is progress no matter how small.
The harder you work for something, the greater you’ll feel when you achieve it.
Focus on your goals, not your fears.
Your only limit is your mind. Push yourself.
Stay committed, stay consistent, and success will follow.
Don't give up. Great things take time.
Keep your eyes on the prize and your heart in the process.
Small daily improvements lead to stunning results.
Turn your can'ts into cans and your dreams into plans.
You are stronger than any challenge that comes your way.
Even the tallest mountain can be climbed one step at a time.
Mistakes are proof that you are trying. Keep going!
Be patient, work hard, and trust your journey.
Energy and persistence conquer all things.
Believe in the power of yet: you haven't mastered it yet, but you will.
Focus on progress, not perfection.
Your journey is unique. Keep moving forward at your pace.
Doubt kills more dreams than failure ever will.
Every day is a new opportunity to become better.
Courage doesn't always roar. Sometimes courage is the quiet voice at the end of the day saying 'I will try again tomorrow.'
Your dreams don’t work unless you do. Keep going!
Push yourself, because no one else is going to do it for you.
Rise above the storm, and you will find the sunshine.
Success is built on consistency, keep showing up.
Don’t wait for the perfect moment. Take the moment and make it perfect.
Believe in your abilities and the universe will conspire in your favor.
Start where you are. Use what you have. Do what you can.
You have within you right now everything you need to deal with whatever the world can throw at you.
Hard work beats talent when talent doesn’t work hard.
The best way to get started is to quit talking and begin doing.
Push through the fear. Growth happens on the other side.
Don't let yesterday take up too much of today.
The difference between ordinary and extraordinary is that little extra effort.
Keep your head up. Every setback is a setup for a comeback.
You are capable of more than you know. Go prove it to yourself.
Stay focused and never give up on your dreams.
Every accomplishment starts with the decision to try.
Doubt kills more dreams than failure ever will.
Don’t be afraid to start over. It’s a chance to rebuild what you want.
Success is the sum of small efforts repeated day in and day out.
Your journey may be hard, but the destination is worth it.
Obstacles are opportunities to grow stronger and wiser.
Every morning you have a new opportunity to shape your life.
Your determination today shapes your success tomorrow.
Hard days are what make you stronger.
Never underestimate the power of persistence.
Keep going, even if progress seems slow—it’s still progress.
Believe in the beauty of your dreams and chase them relentlessly.
The secret to getting ahead is getting started.
You have the power to change your story starting today.

Learning never stops, from general school to university.

Every level of education is a new step toward self-improvement.

The best students are those who never stop learning.
Education gives you the power to change your future.
Flavius enjoys combining creativity with technology in his studies.
At Liceul Cibinium Sibiu, students gain both theory and hands-on experience.
The Faculty of Engineering ULBS encourages innovation and research.
Computer engineering at ULBS builds a bridge between ideas and implementation.
Flavius chose Computers because he loves solving complex problems.
A good education opens countless opportunities.
Success begins with curiosity and effort.
Scoala 21 taught Flavius discipline; Cibinium taught him focus; ULBS taught him vision.
Every day at school is a new chance to grow and learn.
Teachers guide, but motivation must come from within.
Engineering requires logic, patience, and creativity — qualities that Flavius developed at ULBS.
Never stop asking questions — that’s how true learning begins.
Each subject teaches more than facts — it builds your way of thinking.
At Cibinium, students learn to combine practice with innovation.
Flavius believes learning is a journey, not a race.
A degree in Computer Engineering opens the door to the future of technology.
School is not just about grades — it’s about developing your mind.
Every student at Scoala 21 starts building their future from the ground up.
Flavius always says: 'Education is an investment, not a chore.'
At ULBS, collaboration and curiosity lead to success.
Cibinium Sibiu helps students discover their professional paths.
Flavius’s experience proves that consistency beats talent when learning.
Studying Computers at ULBS prepares students for real engineering challenges.
The Faculty of Engineering is a place for creators, problem-solvers, and dreamers.
Scoala Generala Nr. 21 encourages curiosity and critical thinking from a young age.
Learning engineering means learning how to turn ideas into solutions.
Flavius has always valued education as the key to personal growth.
Education connects passion with purpose.
Whether you study at Scoala 21, Cibinium, or ULBS — what matters most is dedication.
Knowledge gained today becomes power tomorrow.
